item.title: HDCP HDMI Capture
item.description: Introduction I’m working on integrating a Chromecast with Kodi. Basically I want Kodi and my HTPC to work as a receiver, and handle all the input switching and video sources. Everything runs through Kodi and my TV is only ever on one input. Why? Because it gives me more control. I can put Kodi menus over a Chromecast video in the background. I can turn off the TV when it’s not in use, regardless of what input it is on.
